Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அழக்கொண்ட எல்லாம் அழப்போம் இழப்பினும் பிற்பயக்கும் நற்பா லவை.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: All that has been obtained with tears (to the victim) will depart with tears (to himself); but what has been by fair means; though with loss at first, will afterwards yield fruit.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition. On the left, a tyrant is shown seizing wealth from a crying family ('அழக்கொண்ட'). The seized wealth is depicted as being made of solidified tears.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Later, this tear-made wealth is shown melting and flowing away from the tyrant, who is now himself crying in sorrow as he loses it all ('அழப்போம்'). On the right, a virtuous person is shown losing their initial investment in a good deed, perhaps planting a seed that takes a long time to grow ('இழப்பினும்').
Layered_Composition.Background: Later in time, the seed planted by the virtuous person has grown into a magnificent, fruit-bearing tree, which provides them with a great and lasting reward ('பிற்பயக்கும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Wealth gained by causing tears will be lost with tears. But an action done by fair means, even if it starts with a loss, will bring future benefits.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The wealth made of tears is a literal metaphor. The contrast between this melting wealth and the growing tree of good deeds is the core of the story.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Poetic justice, consequential, patient virtue rewarded.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left (unjust) side is dark, tragic, and lit with a cold, tear-like silvery light. The right (just) side begins humbly but ends in the warm, golden light of a bountiful harvest.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A narrative diptych, showing the cause and effect on both the unjust and just sides.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with beautiful effects for the tear-wealth and the growing tree.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Contrasting lighting that evolves with the narrative.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Allegorical painting, with a strong narrative flow.
